TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StaticResourceExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

Docs.summary: Implements a markup extension that supports static (XAML load time) resource references made from XAML.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is a markup extension implementation. Markup extension classes in WPF exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. This extension supports the [StaticResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension) usage from XAML. For more information on the mechanics of static resource lookup in WPF XAML, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension) or [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources).
`{StaticResource}` is a markup extension that is specific to the WPF implementation of XAML. You can use `{StaticResource}` when referencing the default XAML namespace for WPF, without using a prefix. In contrast, markup extensions that are defined for XAML language support (such as `{x:Type}`) require the prefix for the XAML language XAML namespace in the usage. For more information, see [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml).
Static resource references are generally used in XAML whenever a [DynamicResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension) is not explicitly necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

Docs.param: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.
Docs.summary: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied. For , this is the object found in a resource dictionary, where the object to find is identified by the .
Docs.returns: The object value to set on the property where the markup extension provided value is evaluated.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. The XAML processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `StaticResource` extension values during object creation.
The property to be set can be identified by a <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> (standard property) or <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> (dependency property).
This implementation relies on XAML-related services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. It must not be `null`. In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] implementation, the following are required services from service context:
- <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>
- <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider>
- <xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider>
If any of these services are missing, usage of the markup extension throws an exception.

Docs.exception: was , or failed to implement a required service.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the key value passed by this static resource reference. They key is used to return the object matching that key in resource dictionaries.
Docs.value: The resource key for a resource.
